question: Which of the following statements is correct about El-Nino?
option1: There would be upwelling of cold water on the coast of Peru.
option3: Results in floods in larger part of Asia.
option4: El-Nino is also referred to as Little Girl.
explanation: The upwelling of cold water is during the normal years and it is reversed during El-Nino years on the coast of Peru. This upwelling of warm water results in heavy rainfall in Peruvian deserts. The larger part of Asia witness drought not floods during El-Nino years and it is La-Nina which is referred as Little Girl, El-Nino is referred to as little Boy.
